entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:05 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.9°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -49
Dewpoint: -39.5°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 39. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 35. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
